00028 #define CHECK_IRQ if( sreg == 0 )

00034 static int traceId = 0;
00035 int traceOn = FALSE;
00036 
00037 void SpiTraceOn (bool_t flag)
00038 {
00039     traceOn = flag;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void PrintSpi(CMDT command, uint8_t address,
00043               uint8_t *buffer, uint8_t len)
00044 {
00045     char c;
00046     int n;
00047 
00048     printf ("%4d:", traceId++);
00049     c = (command == WRITE_CMD) ? 'W' : 'R';
00050     printf (" %c", c);
00051     if (address < 16)
00052     {
00053         printf (" 0x0");
00054     }
00055     else
00056     {
00057         printf (" 0x");
00058     }
00059     printf ("%x", address);
00060     printf (" %3d: ", len);
00061 
00062     for (n = 0; n < len; n++)
00063     {
00064         if (buffer[n] < 16)
00065         {
00066             printf ("0");
00067         }
00068         printf ("%x ", buffer[n]);
00069         if(( (n + 1) % 16 ) == 0 )
00070         {
00071             printf ("\n                  ");
00072         }
00073     }
00074     printf ("\n");
00075 }
00076 
00077 void traceSpiReset (void)
00078 {
00079     traceId = 0;
00080 }
00081 #endif /* CONFIG_SPI_TRACE */
00082 /**
00083  * NTRXPowerOnReset:
00084  *
00085  * NanoReset() resets the nanoNET chip and adjusts the pin level.
00086  *
00087  * Returns: none
00088  */
00089 
00090 void NTRXPowerOnReset(void)
00091 {
00092     PON_RST_PORT &= ~PON_RST_PIN;                   /* PD5 low */
00093 
00094     /*
00095      * The reset line has to stay low for at least 360 us
00096      * before you can access the transceiver through the
00097      * SPI interface.
00098      * If you need to optimize the startup time you can
00099      * can do other stuff in between and either remove
00100      * or shorten this active waiting period.
00101      */
00102     HWDelayus (100);
00103     PON_RST_PORT |= PON_RST_PIN;                      /* PD5 high */
00104     HWDelayus (400);
00105 }
00106 
00107 /**
00108  * InitSPI:
00109  *
00110  * InitSPI() initializes the spi interface on the microcontroller
00111  *
00112  * Returns: none
00113  */
00114 void InitSPI(void)
00115 {
00116     /*
00117      * SPI bus on Port B
00118      */
00119     SPI_DIR |= (SPI_SS                            /* SPI Slave select      */
00120              |  SPI_CLK                           /* SPI clock             */
00121              |  SPI_MOSI);                        /* SPI Mosi              */
00122 
00123     /*
00124      * Interrupt and SPI chipselect lines
00125      */
00126     PON_RST_DIR   |= PON_RST_PIN;                  /* PD5 for pwrupreset    */
00127     SPI_SSN2_DIR  |= SPI_SSN2_PIN;                 /* PD6 as output for SS2 */
00128     SPI_SSN1_DIR  |= SPI_SSN1_PIN;                 /* PD7 as output for SS1 */
00129 
00130     PON_RST_PORT  |= PON_RST_PIN;                   /* set TRX reset high    */
00131     SPI_SSN2_PORT |= SPI_SSN2_PIN;                  /* set SPI SS high       */
00132     SPI_SSN1_PORT |= SPI_SSN1_PIN;                  /* set SPI SS high       */
00133 
00134     AVR_SPCR  = (1 << AVR_SPE)
00135                 | (1 << AVR_MSTR)
00136                 | (1 << AVR_DORD);                   /* enable SPI master,
00137                                                          clock rate fosc/2,
00138                                                                     LSB first */
00139     AVR_SPSR |= (1 << AVR_SPI2X);                    /* fosc/2 (Double speeed) */
00140 }
00141 
00142 /**
00143  * NTRXSetupSpiInterface:
00144  *
00145  * NTRXSetupSpiInterface() initializes the SPI interface on nanoLOC
00146  *
00147  * Returns: none
00148  */
00149 void NTRXSetupSpiInterface (void)
00150 {
00151     NTRXSPIWriteByte (0x00, 0x42);
00152 }
00153 
00154 void NTRXSPIRead(uint8_t address, uint8_t *buffer, uint8_t len)
00155 {
00156 #   ifdef CONFIG_SPI_TRACE
00157     uint8_t *tb;
00158     uint8_t tl;
00159     tb = buffer;
00160     tl = len;
00161 #   endif
00162 
00163 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00164 //  uint8_t sreg = SREG;
00165 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00166 
00167     if (len > 0x80 || len == 0) return;
00168 
00169 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00170     CHECK_IRQ
00171 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00172         ENTER_TASK;
00173     SPI_SSN1_PORT &= ~SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00174 
00175     AVR_SPDR = (len & 0x7F);
00176     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00177 
00178     AVR_SPDR = address;
00179     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00180 
00181     while(len-- > 0)
00182     {
00183         SPDR = 0xff;
00184         while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00185         *buffer++ = AVR_SPDR;
00186     }
00187 
00188     SPI_SSN1_PORT |= SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00189 
00190 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00191     CHECK_IRQ
00192 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00193         LEAVE_TASK;
00194 #   ifdef CONFIG_SPI_TRACE
00195     if (traceOn == TRUE)
00196     {
00197         // traceSpi(READ_CMD, address, tb, tl);
00198         PrintSpi (READ_CMD, address, tb, tl);
00199     }
00200 #   endif /* CONFIG_SPI_TRACE */
00201 }
00202 
00203 void NTRXSPIWrite(uint8_t address, uint8_t *buffer, uint8_t len)
00204 {
00205 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00206 //  uint8_t sreg = SREG;
00207 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00208 
00209 #   ifdef CONFIG_SPI_TRACE
00210     if (traceOn == TRUE)
00211     {
00212         PrintSpi(WRITE_CMD, address, buffer, len);
00213     }
00214 #   endif /* CONFIG_SPI_TRACE */
00215 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00216     CHECK_IRQ
00217 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00218         ENTER_TASK;
00219 
00220     SPI_SSN1_PORT &= ~SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00221 
00222     AVR_SPDR = 0x80 | (len & 0x7F);
00223     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00224 
00225     AVR_SPDR = address;
00226     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00227 
00228     while(len-- > 0)
00229     {
00230         AVR_SPDR = *buffer++;
00231         while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00232     }
00233 
00234     SPI_SSN1_PORT |= SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00235 
00236 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00237     CHECK_IRQ
00238 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00239         LEAVE_TASK;
00240 }
00241 
00242 void NTRXSPIReadByte(uint8_t address, uint8_t *buffer)
00243 {
00244 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00245 //  uint8_t sreg = SREG;
00246 
00247     CHECK_IRQ
00248 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00249         ENTER_TASK;
00250     /* chip select */
00251     SPI_SSN1_PORT &= ~SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00252 
00253     AVR_SPDR = 1;
00254     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00255 
00256     AVR_SPDR = address;
00257     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00258 
00259     AVR_SPDR = 0xff;
00260     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00261     *buffer = AVR_SPDR;
00262 
00263     /* chip select */
00264     SPI_SSN1_PORT |= SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00265 
00266 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00267     CHECK_IRQ
00268 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00269         LEAVE_TASK;
00270 #   ifdef CONFIG_SPI_TRACE
00271     if (traceOn == TRUE)
00272     {
00273         PrintSpi (READ_CMD, address, buffer, 1);
00274     }
00275 #   endif /* CONFIG_SPI_TRACE */
00276 }
00277 
00278 void NTRXSPIWriteByte(uint8_t address, uint8_t buffer)
00279 {
00280 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00281 //  uint8_t sreg = SREG;
00282 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00283 #   ifdef CONFIG_SPI_TRACE
00284     if (traceOn == TRUE)
00285     {
00286         PrintSpi(WRITE_CMD, address, &buffer, 1);
00287     }
00288 #   endif /* CONFIG_SPI_TRACE */
00289 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00290     CHECK_IRQ
00291 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00292         ENTER_TASK;
00293     /* chip select */
00294     SPI_SSN1_PORT &= ~SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00295 
00296     AVR_SPDR = 0x81;
00297     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00298 
00299     AVR_SPDR = address;
00300     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00301 
00302     AVR_SPDR = buffer;
00303     while(!(AVR_SPSR &(1 << AVR_SPIF)));
00304 
00305     /* chip select */
00306     SPI_SSN1_PORT |= SPI_SSN1_PIN;
00307 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00308     CHECK_IRQ
00309 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ */
00310         LEAVE_TASK;
00311 }
00312 
00313 /**
00314  * NTRXIrqEnable:
00315  * value: -input- boolean enables (TRUE) or disables (FALSE) the external
00316  *                 interrupt request (interrupts from the nanochip)
00317  *
00318  * Returns: none
00319  */
00320 
00321 #ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_IRQ
00322 
00323 void NTRXIrqEnable( bool_t value )
00324 {
00325     if (value == TRUE)
00326     {
00327         EIMSK |= (1 << INT4);
00328     }
00329     else
00330     {
00331         EIMSK &= ~(1 << INT4);
00332     }
00333 }
00334 
00335 extern void NTRXInterrupt (void);
00336 
00337 /**
00338  * INTERRUPT4 external interrupt:
00339  *
00340  * This is an interrupt service routine for the nanochip.
00341  * It calls the nanoInterrupt service routine.
00342  */
00343 SIGNAL(SIG_INTERRUPT4)
00344 {
00345     sreg = 1;
00346     NTRXInterrupt();
00347     sreg = 0;
00348 }
00349 
00350 #endif
